description:
Support for up to 4 players in local multiplay!

-Game Features
Players of Ninja Otedama R support each other by attacking the enemy ninja and juggling them all the way to the goal!
Choose from one of 6 weird yet unique characters.

-Available Modes
[Normal Stages]
Juggle your way through 50 stages of cooperative missions!
[Challenge Stages]
Find out who is the best ninja in 3 different types of challenges!

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switchâ„¢.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series NINJA OTEDAMA R
intro:
Slice and dice but don't drop!?
The definitive version of the deranged party game!
